edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.datalayer.poidb
Class DefaultPOIDBTest

java.lang.Object
  edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.datalayer.poidb.DefaultPOIDBTest

public class DefaultPOIDBTest
extends Object

Tests the the methods DefaultPOIDB.getPOIsByQuery(POIQuery) and DefaultPOIDB.getPOIsByQuery(POIQuery) DefaultPOIDB.getPOIsBySearch(String) will not be tested within this class as the methods results entirely depend on how the interface POIDBSearcher is implemented. IMPORTANT NOTE: Relies on having the correct XML file defined by _dbFile in the directory stated by _testdir. The content of this XML file is append in the regular comments at the end of this file.

Author:
Stefan, Fabian

public void getPOIsByQuerySomeCategoriesSelected()
Test method for DefaultPOIDB.getPOIsByQuery(POIQuery) Tests with some categories selected, so that a partial match of POIs is expected. section and map on query parameters set to null

getPOIsByQueryNoCategoriesSelected

public void getPOIsByQueryNoCategoriesSelected()
Test with no categories selected, so no POI should match. This is performed with an empty List of Categories. section and map on query parameters set to null

public void getPOIsByQueryAllCategoriesSelected()
Test with all categories selected, so all POIs should match. section and map on query parameters set to null

getPOIsByQueryMap1Selected

public void getPOIsByQueryMap1Selected()
Test performed with Map 1 selected. hello1 and hello4 are expected. section and categories are set to null

getPOIsByQueryNoMapSelected

public void getPOIsByQueryNoMapSelected()
Test performed with no Map selected. So no POIs are expected. section and categories are set to null

getPOIsByQueryAllMapsSelected

public void getPOIsByQueryAllMapsSelected()
Test performed with all Maps selected, so all POIs are expected. section and categories are set to null

getPOIsByQuerySomeBySection

public void getPOIsByQuerySomeBySection()
Test performed with the section (49.012000|8.410000) and (49.014000|8.420000). hello1 and hello2 are expected section and categories are set to null

getPOIsByQueryExactHitBySection

public void getPOIsByQueryExactHitBySection()
Test performed with section (49.012743|8.415631) and (49.012743|8.415631) so the section is a point exactly hits hello1. section and categories are set to null

getPOIsByQuerySlightlyOffBySection

public void getPOIsByQuerySlightlyOffBySection()
Test performed with section (49.012743|8.415632) and (49.012743|8.415632) so the section misses hello1 by 1 on the last digit of the longitude. section and categories are set to null

getPOIsByQuerySectionAndCategory

public void getPOIsByQuerySectionAndCategory()
Tests if Categories and MapSection correctly intersect. Section (49.011, 8.41) and (49.014, 8.418) which gets hallo1 and hallo3. Category with Id 1 which gets hello1 and hello 2. So only hello1 is expected. Map is set to null

getPOIsByQuerySectionAndMap

public void getPOIsByQuerySectionAndMap()
Tests if Map and MapSection correctly intersect. Section (49.011, 8.41) and (49.014, 8.418) which gets hallo1 and hallo3. Map with Id 1 which gets hello1 and hello 4. So only hello1 is expected. Category is set to null

getPOIsByQueryMapAndCategory

public void getPOIsByQueryMapAndCategory()
Tests if Map and Category correctly intersect. Category is set to ID 1 which gets hello 1 and hello 2. Map is set to ID 1 which gets hello1 and hello4. So hello1 is expected. MapSection is set to null

getPOIsByQueryTestIntersectAll

public void getPOIsByQueryTestIntersectAll()
Tests if MapSection, Map and Category correctly intersect. Section is set to (49.011, 8.41) and (49.014, 8.418) which gets hallo1 and hallo3. Category is set to ID 1 which gets hello 1 and hello 2. Map is set to ID 1 which gets hello1 and hello4. So hello1 is expected.

getPOIsByIDMatch

public void getPOIsByIDMatch()
Test for DefaultPOIDB.getPOIByID(String) Expects to find the ID in the database.

getPOIsByIDNoMatch

public void getPOIsByIDNoMatch()
Expects not to find the ID in the database.
